attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am aware that this petition duplicates, to an extent, at least two other current petitions.However, I would like to add to this that at a time of economic austerity, I find it bordering on obscene that we have little choice but to pay an enforced fee to fund the multimillionaire lifestyles of certain tv presenters,whilst the majority of us struggle to pay our bills, and others still face losing their job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
